import React from "react"; import "./Cart.css"; function Cart({ cartitems, handleadd, handleremove, handleSubmit }) { const totalPrice = cartitems.reduce( (price, item) => price + item.quantity * item.price, 0 ); return ( <>

Cart Items

{cartitems.map((item) => (

Item Name : {item.name}

Item Price :${item.price}

Quantity : {item.quantity}

))}

Total Bill = ${totalPrice}

Thank You

For Shoping Here
); } export default Cart;
